titles: The morning-watch, or, A spiritual glass opened wherin a clear discovery is made of that which lies in darknesse, from whence wars, contentions, and destructions do arise concerning a professed religion, with a few words of tender counsel unto the Pope, prelate, presbyter, independent & baptist, &c. ... / by ... William Smith.
author: Smith, William, d. 1673.
publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Robert Wilson ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Linrary.
keywords: Society of Friends --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
